mapper.select: SELECT power_meter_info.meter_code AS pCode,power_meter_info.company_code AS companyCode,company_info.company_name AS companyName, MAX(power_meter_record.p_zxygdn) AS ZXYGDN FROM power_meter_info LEFT JOIN company_info ON power_meter_info.company_code = company_info.company_code LEFT JOIN power_meter_record ON power_meter_record.p_code = power_meter_info.meter_code GROUP BY pCode ORDER BY companyCode

SELECT DATE_FORMAT( power_meter_record.p_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS time, power_meter_info.beilv AS beiLv, power_meter_record.p_code AS pCode, power_meter_record.p_zxygdn AS ZXYGDN FROM power_meter_record, power_meter_info WHERE power_meter_record.id IN ( SELECT max(id) FROM power_meter_record WHERE power_meter_record.p_code = #{pCode} AND p_time BETWEEN #{sTime} AND #{eTime} GROUP BY DAY (power_meter_record.p_time), power_meter_record.p_code ) AND power_meter_record.p_code = power_meter_info.meter_code
